ayahs.textUthmani: ۞ وَلَوْ رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ وَكَشَفْنَا مَا بِهِم مِّن ضُرٍّ لَّلَجُّوا۟ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: ۞ وَلَوْ [And if] رَحِمْنَـٰهُمْ [We had mercy on them] وَكَشَفْنَا [and We removed] مَا [what] بِهِم [(was) on them] مِّن [of] ضُرٍّۢ [(the) hardship] لَّلَجُّوا۟ [surely they would persist] فِى [in] طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ [their transgression] يَعْمَهُونَ [wandering blindly]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaw rahimnahum wakashafnama bihim min durrin lalajjoo fee tughyanihimyaAAmahoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ أَخَذْنَـٰهُم بِٱلْعَذَابِ فَمَا ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّعُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And verily] أَخَذْنَـٰهُم [We seized them] بِٱلْعَذَابِ [with the punishment] فَمَا [but not] ٱسْتَكَانُوا۟ [they submit] لِرَبِّهِمْ [to their Lord] وَمَا [and not] يَتَضَرَّعُونَ [they supplicate humbly]
ayahs.transliteration: Walaqad akhathnahum bilAAathabifama istakanoo lirabbihim wama yatadarraAAoon

ayahs.textUthmani: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا ذَا عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمْ فِيهِ مُبْلِسُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: حَتَّىٰٓ [Until] إِذَا [when] فَتَحْنَا [We opened] عَلَيْهِم [for them] بَابًۭا [a gate] ذَا [of a punishment] عَذَابٍۢ [of a punishment] شَدِيدٍ [severe] إِذَا [behold] هُمْ [They] فِيهِ [in it] مُبْلِسُونَ [(will be in) despair]
ayahs.transliteration: Hatta itha fatahnaAAalayhim baban tha AAathabin shadeedin ithahum feehi mublisoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنشَأَ لَكُمُ ٱلسَّمْعَ وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَشْكُرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِىٓ [(is) the One Who] أَنشَأَ [produced] لَكُمُ [for you] ٱلسَّمْعَ [the hearing] وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرَ [and the sight] وَٱلْأَفْـِٔدَةَ ۚ [and the feeling] قَلِيلًۭا [little] مَّا [(is) what] تَشْكُرُونَ [you give thanks]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee anshaa lakumu assamAAawal-absara wal-af-idata qaleelan matashkuroon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَإِلَيْهِ تُحْشَرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] ذَرَأَكُمْ [multiplied you] فِى [in] ٱلْأَرْضِ [the earth] وَإِلَيْهِ [and to Him] تُحْشَرُونَ [you will be gathered]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee tharaakum feeal-ardi wa-ilayhi tuhsharoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُحْىِۦ وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] يُحْىِۦ [gives life] وَيُمِيتُ [and causes death] وَلَهُ [and for Him] ٱخْتِلَـٰفُ [(is the) alternation] ٱلَّيْلِ [(of) the night] وَٱلنَّهَارِ ۚ [and the day] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَعْقِلُونَ [you reason]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee yuhyeewayumeetu walahu ikhtilafu allayli wannahariafala taAAqiloon

ayahs.textUthmani: بَلْ قَالُوا۟ مِثْلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: بَلْ [Nay] قَالُوا۟ [they say] مِثْلَ [(the) like] مَا [(of) what] قَالَ [said] ٱلْأَوَّلُونَ [the former (people)]

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ أَءِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالُوٓا۟ [They said] أَءِذَا [What! When] مِتْنَا [we are dead] وَكُنَّا [and become] تُرَابًۭا [dust] وَعِظَـٰمًا [and bones] أَءِنَّا [would we] لَمَبْعُوثُونَ [surely be resurrected]
ayahs.transliteration: Qaloo a-itha mitnawakunna turaban waAAithamana-inna lamabAAoothoon

ayahs.textUthmani: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا نَحْنُ وَءَابَآؤُنَا هَـٰذَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ أَسَـٰطِيرُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَقَدْ [Verily] وُعِدْنَا [we have been promised] نَحْنُ [[we]] وَءَابَآؤُنَا [and our forefathers] هَـٰذَا [this] مِن [before] قَبْلُ [before] إِنْ [not] هَـٰذَآ [(is) this] إِلَّآ [but] أَسَـٰطِيرُ [(the) tales] ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ [(of) the former (people)]
ayahs.transliteration: Laqad wuAAidna nahnu waabaonahatha min qablu in hatha illa asateerual-awwaleen

ayahs.textUthmani: قُل لِّمَنِ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَمَن فِيهَآ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُل [Say] لِّمَنِ [To whom (belongs)] ٱلْأَرْضُ [the earth] وَمَن [and whoever] فِيهَآ [(is) in it] إِن [if] كُنتُمْ [you] تَعْلَمُونَ [know]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul limani al-ardu waman feehain kuntum taAAlamoon

ayahs.wordByWord: سَيَقُولُونَ [They will say] لِلَّهِ ۚ [To Allah] قُلْ [Say] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَذَكَّرُونَ [you remember]

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ مَن رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ ٱلسَّبْعِ وَرَبُّ ٱلْعَرْشِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] مَن [Who] رَّبُّ [(is the) Lord] ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ [(of) the seven heavens] ٱلسَّبْعِ [(of) the seven heavens] وَرَبُّ [and (the) Lord] ٱلْعَرْشِ [(of) the Throne] ٱلْعَظِيمِ [the Great]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul man rabbu assamawatiassabAAi warabbu alAAarshi alAAatheem

ayahs.wordByWord: سَيَقُولُونَ [They will say] لِلَّهِ ۚ [Allah] قُلْ [Say] أَفَلَا [Then will not] تَتَّقُونَ [you fear (Him)]

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ مَنۢ بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ وَهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيْهِ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] مَنۢ [Who is (it)] بِيَدِهِۦ [in Whose Hand(s)] مَلَكُوتُ [(is the) dominion] كُلِّ [(of) all] شَىْءٍۢ [things] وَهُوَ [and He] يُجِيرُ [protects] وَلَا [and no (one)] يُجَارُ [(can) be protected] عَلَيْهِ [against Him] إِن [If] كُنتُمْ [you] تَعْلَمُونَ [know]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul man biyadihi malakootu kulli shay-inwahuwa yujeeru wala yujaru AAalayhi in kuntumtaAAlamoon

ayahs.wordByWord: سَيَقُولُونَ [They will say] لِلَّهِ ۚ [Allah] قُلْ [Say] فَأَنَّىٰ [Then how] تُسْحَرُونَ [are you deluded]
